page.title: 14 WEEDON BEC PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is ten years old,it was built in 1975.There are 263 children at the school(July 1985).We have nine teachers,one helper,one secretary and one headteacher.Two of our classes work in temporary classrooms. We have separate {playgrounds} for the infant and junior children and a large playing field behind the school. We have just had a new {library} built by some parents and friends. We start school at 08.55 and finish at 15.45.We have two 15 minute playtimes and {lunch} from 12.10 until 13.25 hours.Children either have school dinners,bring sandwiches or go home for dinner.We always have a teacher on duty at playtimes. We do a lot of {sports} at school,we do swimming,netball,football,athletics and gymnastics.
